data.actual_result: It shows you the border of your client, not your unread dms
data.expected_result: [new] icon should point up to your dms, not to the border of your client
data.short_description: Ping indicator [new] is stuck above your home menu
data.steps_to_repro: -scroll down, so the ping indicator [new] appears-switch servers-whils scrollign and switching servers, hold the [ESC] key <- important to hold it all the time-scrol up again to see the [new] indicator being stuck above the home icon
